backend/main.mo: Main actor for the ICP backend that handles user profiles, file references (save/get/remove/list), and blob storage, with role-based access control enforced via an AccessControl mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state (with extra directory/storage maps) into the new actor state by preserving only the files map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (Google Photos UI redesign, upload, lightbox, multi-select, etc.) to their relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'Personal Data Storage' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the main TSX entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that gates rendering on Internet Identity auth state, showing a loading spinner, LoginScreen, or PhotoGalleryView with a ProfileSetupModal for new users.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-page login screen with PhotoVault branding, feature pills (photos, storage, security, formats), and an Internet Identity sign-in button with loading state.
frontend/src/components/MediaGrid.tsx: Renders a date-grouped grid of media thumbnails (images, videos, files) with support for lazy loading, long-press selection, and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/MediaLightbox.ts: Full-screen lightbox overlay for viewing individual media files with navigation, download, share, and file info features.
frontend/src/components/MediaUploadButto: Floating action button that handles single-file uploads with progress tracking, saving the file reference to the backend via ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGalleryView: Main gallery page component that composes the navigation bar, section tabs, media grid, lightbox, upload button, selection bar, and settings panel with shared state management.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog shown on first use that prompts the user to enter their name and saves it as their profile via the backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SectionNavigatio: Sticky tab bar with Photos, Albums, and Library sections that highlights the active section and calls a callback on change.
frontend/src/components/SelectionActionB: Floating action bar shown during multi-select mode, providing download, share, copy, and delete actions for the selected files with a confirmation dialog for deletion.
A slide-out settings panel (Sheet) showing user profile info, storage usage progress bar, and a logout button, with storage quota hardcoded at 1000 TB.
Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TopNavigationBar: A sticky top navigation bar with a logo, search input, and user avatar/dropdown; switches to a selection-mode toolbar showing selected count and select-all when files are being selected.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, exposing login/logout functions and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing files, managing user quota, saving/deleting file references, and reading/writing the caller's user profile via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens) along with utility classes for media thumbnails and scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/fileHelpers.ts: Provides utility functions for file handling including byte formatting, ICP nanosecond timestamp formatting, storage percentage calculation, and MIME-type-based file icon/label helpers, plus a FileReader-based file-to-Uint8Array converter.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom Google-inspired fonts, an extended oklch-based color palette (including sidebar and chart tokens), custom border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing a Google Photos-like media storage app (1000 TB capacity) with its existing features (gallery UI, upload, lightbox, multi-select, storage indicator, theming) and pending feature requests tracked by version.
